name: audioLock
short_description: An application that utilizes voice recognition to provide verbal authentication. This application is intended to unlock the screen of desiring using a spoken password phrase.  It is a simple base program that is very flexible in terms of expansion, with further potential implementation as a means to password protect files, authenticate other applications, or act as a password manager. The AudioLock voice password application is designed to run on locally on an android device and to allow users to setup an account with a master and audio password, edit a preexisting account, utilize voice and master password to lock and unlock chosen device.
